channel.title: Add item problems java swing
channel.description:
i made a java swing based ge but i cant figure out how to add it to my server it refuses to recognize the [code=java]player.getInventory().addItem(995, 5000);[/code] keeps telling me this...
Cannot make a static reference to the non-static method getInventory() from the type Player
i assume making getInventory() static will wreck half the code in my server is there somthing obvious that i should do that im just forgetting or somthing?
